name: YOZGOD
description:
Yozgod is simpler clone of Splatoon. It’s name comes from a city named Yozgat in Turkey. We made this game for Unity lesson in March 2018.

For design document and designers other projects: www.erencaylak.com

We had one week and i wanted to design this game. We could choose an original game but we had limited time. So i wanted to design funny and playable game and Platoon was just on Nintento. Also it’s mechanics are not so hard for limited time. I wrote the game design document before Yozgod but nothing happened. So it is my first game that i designed. Specially i paid attention to art style and making a replayable game. So i did.

Except coding all assets are ready asset and i put their source sites down.

Have Fun!
